headline: Under mounting toy pressures, Hasbro has a secret sauce that Mattel hasn't matched
summary: Hasbro's secret weapon has been its Wizards of the Coast division, which includes Dungeons & Dragons, Magic: The Gathering and the company's digital games.

raw.headline: Under mounting toy pressures, Hasbro has a secret sauce that Mattel hasn't matched
raw.summary: Hasbro's secret weapon has been its Wizards of the Coast division, which includes Dungeons & Dragons, Magic: The Gathering and the company's digital games.

headline: Why toymakers like Hasbro and Mattel need Hollywood
summary: Toymakers like Hasbro and Mattel are banking on the release of blockbuster films like “Toy Story 5,” “The Mandalorian & Grogu” and “Masters of the Universe” to boost toy sales and bring in more customers. Toy companies have been hit by tariffs, and inflation has curbed spending. CNBC’s Sarah Whitten explores what they’re doing differently this year.
